column5: Shimano makes a 7'10" telescopic baitcast rod in their Clarus line. Wondering if anyone has had anything to do with these rods or have even seen them (I have been interested in checking them out for a couple years now) but know of no one that handles this model. Thinking they would make a great deadstick rod. Any information would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
OOOPs Posted in the wrong forum.
